summary.p: The shared letter [from Martin Bucer and Kaspar Hedio to Bonifacius Amerbach dated September 13, 1542] is intended only for Bullinger and Theodor [Bibliander] and should be burned afterward so that Myconius does not appear as a betrayer of secrets.

div.p: This is for you and Theodor alone. After you have seen enough, hand it over to Vulcan, I ask, so that no one may say I have betrayed secrets.
